policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
  <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">

    <!-- Execute JavaScript: set an outgoing request header -->
    <L7p:JavaScriptAssertion>
      <L7p:ScriptString stringValue="var req = context.getVariable('request');\nreq.setHeader('X-Env-Tag', 'dev');\n"/>
    </L7p:JavaScriptAssertion>

    <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
      <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="http://app-3-java.test-apps.svc:8080/up"/>
      <!-- ... rest unchanged ... -->
      <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/>
    </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
  </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
